work: Epistle to the Son of the Wolf
author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: در اشراق چهارم از اشراقات ذکر نموديم از برای هر امری ناصری لازم و جنود منصوره در اين ظهور اعمال و اخلاق پسنديده است و قائد و سردار اين جنود تقوی اللّه بوده اوست دارای کلّ و حاکم بر کلّ *
translation: In the fourth Ishraq (splendor) of the Ishráqát (Tablet of Splendors) We have mentioned: "Every cause needeth a helper. In this Revelation the hosts which can render it victorious are the hosts of praiseworthy deeds and upright character. The leader and commander of these hosts hath ever been the fear of God, a fear that encompasseth all things, and reigneth over all things."
